description: Try our easy to follow Soft Shell Crab with Coconut Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Crab dishes,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Seafood,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Soft Shell Crab with Coconut Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 long green chilli, deseeded, finely chopped (red chilli can substitute)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a tray with baking paper. Place crab pieces onto prepared tray and bake for 20 to 25 minutes, turning once, until golden.
Meanwhile, process remaining ingredients in a food processor until smooth. Transfer to a serving bowl. Place crab onto a platter and sprinkle with mint and coriander. Serve with dressing.
